hazards.description: Unintended acceleration due to torque command failure
Loss of braking torque during regenerative braking
Uncontrolled motor torque oscillation causing vehicle instability
Inverter thermal runaway leading to fire
High voltage isolation failure causing electric shock
Battery over-discharge due to power management failure
Motor speed sensor failure leading to incorrect vehicle speed display
DC link overvoltage damaging inverter components

safety_goals.description: Prevent unintended acceleration by ensuring torque command integrity
safety_goals.safe_state: Zero torque output, enable friction brakes

safety_goals.description: Maintain regenerative braking capability to prevent loss of deceleration
Prevent motor torque oscillations that could destabilize the vehicle
safety_goals.safe_state: Reduce torque to minimum stable value

safety_goals.description: Prevent inverter thermal damage and fire hazard
Maintain high voltage isolation to prevent electric shock
safety_goals.safe_state: Disconnect HV battery, activate discharge circuit

safety_goals.description: Prevent battery over-discharge that could damage cells
safety_goals.safe_state: Limit power consumption, enter limp mode

safety_goals.description: Provide accurate vehicle speed information to driver
Prevent DC link overvoltage damage to inverter
